notion.title: Notion
notion.description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Notion Source. While there are only a handful of required properties, you will likely need to override the default property name mappings to match the property names in your notion account.

kind_property.title: Kind Property
kind_property.description: The page property that determines the kind of object a page is, i.e., project, epic, sprint, or task. It must have a select type in Notion. It's expected that each kind of object has a unique, fixed value, which must be provided in the object's configuration section.

kind.title: Project Kind
kind.description: The value of the kind property for project types.

name.title: Name
name.description: The property that determines a project's name

description.title: Description
description.description: The property that determines a project's description

kind.title: Epic Kind
kind.description: The value of the kind property for epic types

name.title: Name
name.description: The property that determines an epic's name

description.title: Description
description.description: The property that determines an epic's description

project.title: Project
project.description: The property that determines an epic's project. It must have a relation type in Notion.

status.title: Status
status.description: The property that determines an epic's status

kind.title: Sprint Kind
kind.description: The value of the kind property for sprint types

name.title: Name
name.description: The property that determines a sprint's name

description.title: Description
description.description: The property that determines a sprint's description

status.title: Status
status.description: The property that determines a sprint's status

started_at.title: Started At
started_at.description: The property that determines a sprint's start timestamp

ended_at.title: Ended At
ended_at.description: The property that determines a sprint's end timestamp

closed_at.title: Closed At
closed_at.description: The property that determines a sprint's closed timestamp

kind.title: Task Kind
kind.description: The value of the kind property for task types

include_additional_properties.title: Include Additional Properties
include_additional_properties.description: Include unmapped properties in the task's additional fields

name.title: Name
name.description: The property that determines a task's name

description.title: Description
description.description: The property that determines a task's description

type.title: Task Type
type.description: The property that determines a task's type, e.g., story, bug, etc.

project.title: Project
project.description: The property that determines a task's project. It must have a relation type in Notion.

epic.title: Epic
epic.description: The property that determines a task's epic. It must have a relation type in Notion.

sprint.title: Sprint
sprint.description: The property that determines a task's sprint. It must have a relation type in Notion

status.title: Status
status.description: The property that determines a task's status

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: The property that determines a task's priority

points.title: Points
points.description: The property that determines a task's points

assignee.title: Assignee
assignee.description: The property that determines a task's assignee. It must have a person type in Notion.
